description: A pipeline that copies the reference files to S3, so they can be inputted back into create_refs again

stdin: set -x && aws --endpoint-url https://s3.amazonaws.com/ s3 cp /pfs/create_refs s3://pachyderm-aqua/create_refs --recursive && aws --endpoint-url https://s3.amazonaws.com/ s3 cp s3://pachyderm-aqua/create_refs /pfs/word_alignment/refs --recursive
